ItemId.name: item_id
ItemId.description: The ID of the required Item

PropertyId.name: property_id
PropertyId.description: The ID of the required Property

ItemStatementId.name: statement_id
ItemStatementId.description: The ID of a Statement on an Item

PropertyStatementId.name: statement_id
PropertyStatementId.description: The ID of a Statement on a Property

SiteId.name: site_id
SiteId.description: The ID of the required Site

ItemFields.name: _fields
ItemFields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in each response object.

PropertyFields.name: _fields
PropertyFields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in each response object.

PropertyFilter.name: property
PropertyFilter.description: Single Property ID to filter Statements by.

IfNoneMatch.name: If-None-Match
IfNoneMatch.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has been modified since the specified entity revision numbers

IfModifiedSince.name: If-Modified-Since
IfModifiedSince.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has been modified after the specified date

IfMatch.name: If-Match
IfMatch.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has not been modified since one of the specified entity revision numbers

IfUnmodifiedSince.name: If-Unmodified-Since
IfUnmodifiedSince.description: Conditionally perform the request only if the resource has not been modified after the specified date

Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description: Make authenticated request using a provided bearer token
